name: Lights & Shadows [Demo]
description:
Execute the perfect museum heist alongside a thieving friend: Hide in the shadows, distract guards, fill your bags with precious artefacts and make your daring escape!

[Very early demo - to restart the game alt-f4 and re-open]

Controls (2-Player)

Move:  WASD (1); Arrow Keys (2)

Interact / Pick up: E (1); Right Ctrl (2)

Break Cabinet: F (1); Right Shift (2)
